ActJudges Act
SubjectHon. Harry S. LaForme ** RESIGNATION AND ANNUITY **
PrecisResignation and granting of an ANNUITY to the Hon. HARRY S. LAFORME, a Justice of Appeal of the Court of Appeal for Ontario, effective October 10, 2018.
